title: VERY NICE 5BD/3.5BA Townhome in GREAT Uptown Location! 1 MONTH FREE!
posting_body: ['VERY NICE 5BD/3.5BA', 'Townhome in GREAT Uptown Location!', 'Built 2020, Available 8/1!', 'Property Address', '2109 Aldrich Ave S - Unit B | Minneapolis, MN', 'Available: 08/01/2022', 'Offered By', 'Perkins Levin Property Management |', 'show contact info', 'Description', 'We are currently running a leasing special of 1 MONTH FREE for a 12 month lease or 2 MONTHS FREE for a 22-23 month lease.', 'This townhome was built in 2020 and there are many great things you will love about this place:', '-Big bedrooms & lots of closet space', '-Rooftop Balcony', '-Private Laundry', '-3.5 baths', '-Beautiful kitchen w/ granite, tile back-splash & a dishwasher', '-Hardwood floors', '-AC/Forced Heat', '-Lots of Windows & Natural Light', '-Premium Uptown location', '-Off-street Parking (additional cost)', '-Pets OK ($50/month pet rent)', '-Professional Management & Maintenance staff (handles Lawn Care & Snow Removal)', '-And much more!', 'Water/Trash/Sewage Utilities = Flat rate $125/month, tenants are also responsible for gas and electric.', 'For more information or to schedule a showing, contact Alex at', 'show contact info', '(text/email preferred).', 'Amenities', 'Lawn', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'In-Unit Laundry', 'Balcony', 'Off-Street Parking', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Mud room', 'Office/Den', 'Professional Management', 'Professional Maintenance', 'Online Rent Pay', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 5BD/3.5BA', 'Square Feet: 2,250', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $3,495.00', 'Available: 08/01/2022', 'Application Fee: $45.00', 'Security Deposit: $3,495.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Dogs allowed']
